data.name: AddOrderConfirmationSubject
data.value: [SystemReference] Thank you for purchasing Cartoonkart Voucher

data.name: NotifyComplaint
data.value:
Team,
We have got a ticket from website, please login and replay to customer ASAP.

Regards,
Administrator

data.name: NotifyPurchaseError
data.value:
Team,
We have got an order from website, however the page is not able to send the mail to customer.
Please send an acknowledgement mail that we have received the order.

[Details]

Regards,
Administrator

data.name: OrderAcknowledgement
data.value:
Thank you for Shopping on Cartoonkart.com!
Hello [FirstName], We appreciate your recent purchase of Cartoonkart voucher from [Dealer].
This is to acknowledge that we have received your request for [Dealer] voucher redemption and the image.

Your image has been forwarded to one of our artists for processing.
Your order number is [SystemReference].

Order details - [Product]

If you have any feedback, visit Cartoonkart.com and use your CK-Reference and Email address to manage your order or post feedback.

This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply.

© Cartoonkart.com, Sydney - Australia, Dubai, India.

email : support@cartoonkart.com

data.name: OrderConfirmation
data.value:
Thank you for placing the order for caricature!

Greetings from Cartoonkart

Hello, Your order details are below.

Reference no : CK-[Ref]

Product : [Product]

Amount : [Amount]

© Cartoonkart.com, Sydney - Australia, Dubai, India.

email : support@cartoonkart.com

data.name: SendClearImageRequestBody
data.value:
We would like to first thank you for your patience.

This is to bring to kind attention that the picture you have uploaded is not clear enough as expected. We require pictures with clear face details. This will render us to deliver high quality caricatures.

Example Image

Can you please send pictures as soon as possible to process your order?

Send your pictures as a reply to this email

© Cartoonkart.com, Sydney - Australia, Dubai, India.

email: support@cartoonkart.com

data.name: SendImageToCustomerDraftBody
data.value:
Your Personalized Caricature Draft (before coloring) is ready!

Greetings from Cartoonkart

Hello [FirstName], We would like to first thank you for your patience. We are happy to announce that the draft copy of your caricature (before coloring) is ready.

Please let us know if you have any comments. If no comments are received within 24hours, this caricature will be colored and sent to your inbox.
Preview it now

© Cartoonkart.com, Sydney - Australia, Dubai, India.

email : support@cartoonkart.com

data.name: SendImageToCustomerPreviewBody
data.value:

Hello [FirstName], We would like to first thank you for your patience. We are happy to announce that your caricature is ready!

If you are happy with our work, kindly leave us a good review on [DealerName]
